streamstemplate:
streams template for datm in CCSM4
!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 solar data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
FSDS swdn
%p/Solar6Hrly
coszen
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.Solr.%ym.nc
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 precipitation data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
PRECTmms precn
%p/Precip6Hrly
nearest
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.Prec.%ym.nc
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 temperature, pressure, humidity and wind data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
TBOT tbot WIND wind QBOT shum PSRF pbot
%p/TmpPrsHumWnd3Hrly
linear
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.TPQW.%ym.nc
Stream description file for atmospheric forcing from single point datasets
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/domain.clm
%do
domain.lnd.1x1pt-mexicocityMEX_navy.090715.nc
domain.lnd.1x1pt-vancouverCAN_navy.090715.nc
domain.lnd.1x1pt-urbanc_alpha_navy.090715.nc
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot QBOT shum WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/%c
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/mexicocityMEX.c080124
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/vancouverCAN.c080124
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/urbanc_alpha.c080416
%ym.nc
clm1pt-1993-12.nc
clm1pt-1992-08.nc
clm1pt-0001-08.nc clm1pt-0001-09.nc clm1pt-0001-10.nc clm1pt-0001-11.nc clm1pt-0001-12.nc clm1pt-0002-01.nc clm1pt-0002-02.nc clm1pt-0002-03.nc clm1pt-0002-04.nc clm1pt-0002-05.nc clm1pt-0002-06.nc clm1pt-0002-07.nc clm1pt-0002-08.nc clm1pt-0002-09.nc clm1pt-0002-10.nc clm1pt-0002-11.nc
GISS "normal year" data
GISS
time time lon lon lat lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
nyf.giss.T62.051007.nc
lwdn lwdn swdn swdn swup swup
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
linear
0
nyf.giss.T62.051007.nc
GXGXS "normal year" data
GXGSXS
time time lon lon lat lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
nyf.gxgxs.T62.051007.nc
prc prec
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
linear
0
nyf.gxgxs.T62.051007.nc
NCEP "normal year" data
NCEP
time time lon lon lat lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
nyf.ncep.T62.050923.nc
dn10 dens slp_ pslv q_10 shum t_10 tbot u_10 u v_10 v
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/NYF
linear
0
nyf.ncep.T62.050923.nc

GCGCS
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
prc prec
/ccsm/ocn/iaf
linear
0
